title: Sno-Show (Vermillion Editions' 15th Anniversary Exhibition)
marks:
Signed, annotated LL, in red graphite: [R.G.]
LLC: [#10]
description: Color run for \"Sno-Show\"; sign for the MIA facade, UR; a plane flying over the Minneapolis skyline, UL; a sled, bottom center, inscribed \"TWIN CITY TRANSPORTATION Co/PUBLIC SLED NUMBER 100485\'\"; other inchoate subjects throughout
creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, Gift of David Parker
